entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
